Package io.github.motetpaper.temperature

Class Kelvin

java.lang.Object
io.github.motetpaper.temperature.Kelvin
All Implemented Interfaces:
Temperature
public final class Kelvin extends Object implements Temperature
Represents the Kelvin temperature scale.
